title: New: Hunt In Pairs – Slow Dance
body:
This debut track from UK based duo **Hunt In Pairs** is a gloriously ethereal affair, catching me slightly off guard.

Heavily reverb focused, _Slow Dance_ is mirage like in it’s sound, twisting around a dubstep influenced beat and dreamy shoegaze inspired guitars. As described by the tracks press release, teenagers ‘**Zan Crabbe** and **Jake Jubba** are two youngsters with a vision’ and it’s certainly going to be interesting watching this vision unfurl.

 [Slow Dance](http://soundcloud.com/huntinpairs/slow-dance-1) by [Hunt In Pairs](http://soundcloud.com/huntinpairs)
